## GitHub Instructions

- Use the GitHub MCP server and all of the GitHub MCP Server tools for all GitHub related services. Provide a link to GitHub after every command so I can see what you did on the web.
- When searching GitHub, it's best to use single words or at most a couple words.

## Terraform Instructions

- Use the Terraform MCP server for all Terraform-related services. Provide a link to Terraform Cloud after every command so I can see what you did.
- Ignore state management as state is stored in Terraform Cloud.
- When working with Terraform, focus on configuration files and modules.
